meanings.sent1: She made a financially wise decision to invest in the stock market.
meanings.sent2: The financially stable company was able to weather economic downturns.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his piggy bank was the most financially savvy member of the family.
meanings.sent4: The financially successful entrepreneur built her empire from the ground up.
meanings.sent5: The financially responsible individual always saved a portion of their income.

meanings.definition: in a way that relates to money or finances
meanings.sent1: They managed their budget financially by tracking every expense.
meanings.sent2: She was able to support her family financially after getting a promotion.
meanings.sent3: The comedian humorously discussed the struggles of being financially challenged.
meanings.sent4: The idea of saving for a rainy day resonated with her financially.
meanings.sent5: He navigated the world of investments financially, always considering risks.

meanings.definition: in terms of money or finances
meanings.sent1: The project was evaluated financially before receiving approval.
meanings.sent2: They planned their retirement financially to ensure a comfortable future.
meanings.sent3: The cat proudly displayed its financially acquired toy mouse to its owner.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams of traveling the world were limited financially by her job.
meanings.sent5: He approached the decision to buy a house financially, considering all costs.
